snippet: Aside from $822,000 in cash, the authorities found little of value in James (Whitey) Bulger’s apartment, but they hope an auction will attract buyers.
abstract: Federal authorities hope to attract buyers for belongings of Boston gangster James (Whitey) Bulger as they plan to hold a criminal forfeiture auction of his possessions.
lead_paragraph: Aside from $822,000 in cash, the authorities found little of value in James (Whitey) Bulger’s apartment, but they hope an auction will attract buyers.

headline.main: Proceeds of Bulger Items Will Compensate Victims
headline.print_headline: Proceeds of Bulger Items Will Compensate Victims
